WorkItem.Description:
Is there a Forum where Problems can be ADDRESSED? I have never seen anyone actually Respond to  Problem Here, so this must be a .. I don't know what , but not the place to get help.  VR Player Android cannot play Video Files that VLC Player has no Problem With!  I have yet to view a Single Downloaded Mp4 in VR Player.  It usually plays the Audio, but the Video is Black Screen.

Where can I find out ANYTHING about the problems with VR PLayer?  This 'ISSUES' page never gets any responses from the company that makes it!  SOOOOO. Where to go?

THANKS!
WorkItem.Summary: Is there a Forum where Problems can be ADDRESSED?
